entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Terrace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:03 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 02:00 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1
